## Open Research

This thesis has been written using R Markdown with the **bookdown**
package [@Xie2016-oa; @Xie2017-ke]. All materials required to build the
thesis from source can be obtained from https://github.com/sa-lee/thesis. An
online version of the thesis is available at https://sa-lee.github.io/thesis.
